apidoc.title: Staywell API Documentation
apidoc.name: Staywell
apidoc.description:
There are 3 possibilities for accessing the API:
  • Without any authorization at all : These routes do not require any type of authentication (Main_Routes, Public_API, Content_Preview, Januvia_Application, Guidelines, IPad Applications, Token_API) .
  • Sending an authorization token in the header: Before accessing these routes, you must first make a POST call to the next URL - http://localhost:8080/authenticateToken , sending a username and a password in the body in order to retrieve a token. After receiving this token, use it the HTTP headers like this “Authorization Bearer tokenHere” (MSD_DOC, Mobile_API, Global_API, DPOC, Contract Management, Check-In_Conferences_API).
  • Enabling the dev_mode in the environment.js file (change the isEnabled property to true and the loggedInWith property with a username which has medic/admin/streamadmin rights - according to your needs) . After making these modifications, any of the routes /api/admin, /api/ and /api/streamadmin will be accessible, if the user has the right to access the requested API (Live_Conferences, Admin_API, Medic_API, Elearning_API).
